title: Textile, "Tree of Life", 1974
medium: Technique: plain weave foundation, screen printed using 12 flatbed screens
inscribed: Along both edges," :TREE OF LIFE from SPRINGS of WISDOM Printed in England for Warner & Sons Ltd." at bottom left signed in ink "(copyright symbol) Sue Palmer 4th F 1991".
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 302 x 142.5 cm (9 ft. 10 7/8 in. x 56 1/8 in.)
Repeat H: 81.5 cm (32 1/16 in.)
description:
Symbolic motifs of the world and creation arranged in stripes. 
Major stripe: the solar system and the universe above the eath, sky and ocean arranged in the shape of a tantric egg. The life process is symbolised by the tree. Animals surround the tree. 
Borders: 12 signs of the zodiac, flowers of the seasons associted with the zodiac, and dark srtipes diving the areas taken from the 64 hexagrams in the "I Ching". Multicolor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Tree of Life", 1974.
1974. Technique: plain weave foundation, screen printed using 12 flatbed screens. Gift of Sue Palmer. 1991-57-3.
